thread.title: Rico Petrocelli to speak at Tuesday’s Danvers Touchdown Club meeting
thread.title_full: Rico Petrocelli to speak at Tuesday’s Danvers Touchdown Club meeting

title: Rico Petrocelli to speak at Tuesday’s Danvers Touchdown Club meeting
text: 4:07 PM Updated at 4:39 PM   4:07 PM Updated at 4:39 PM DANVERS The Danvers Touchdown Club’s next meeting is fast approaching. This coming Tuesday, Oct. 27, the club will convene at Timothy’s at the Village Green, 225 Newbury Street. It will begin with a social hour at 6 p.m., followed by dinner at 7 p.m. This month’s special guest speaker is former Red Sox star Rico Petrocelli, and he will talk, following dinner, at 8 p.m. The menu this month will include a bountiful fall buffet of salad, turkey, roast pork and roast beef with all the fixings, not to mention ice cream and coffee/tea. The cost is a very reasonable at $30 that also includes draft beer. Special dietary needs will be accommodated upon request. To make reservations, send an email or text/call Larry at 508-364-1677. Wicked Local   4:07 PM Updated at 4:39 PM
